TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TabRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于呈现具有视觉样式的选项卡控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a tab control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现一个选项卡上的操作系统的当前视觉样式的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a tab control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这很有用，如果您正在绘制应具有的当前的视觉样式的外观的自定义控件。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制选项卡控件，使用方法来绘制页上，使用方法，以便绘制每个选项卡。To draw a tab control, use the method to draw the page, and use the method to draw each tab. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，此类的方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的选项卡控件。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the tab control with the current visual style. 否则，方法与此类属性会引发。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，请检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, check the value of the property. 此类包装的功能设置为其中一个元素由公开类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件和方法来绘制具有两个选项卡的基本选项卡控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a basic tab control with two tabs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 绘制用于在选项卡控件中选择页的选项卡。

span.span: Draws a tab that is used to select a page in the tab control.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawTabItem (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState state);

Public Shared Sub DrawTabItem (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As TabItemState)

param.name: bounds
param.span: 用于指定选项卡边界的 。

span.span: The that specifies the bounds of the tab.

param.name: state
param.span: 值之一，它指定选项卡的可视状态。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the tab.

summary.span: 绘制具有指定状态和边界的选项卡。

span.span: Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds.

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.

exception.span: 或

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.

exception.span: 或

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsSupported { get; }
.property bool IsSupported
Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsSupported As Boolean
public: static property bool IsSupported { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 类能否用于绘制具有视觉样式的选项卡控件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a tab control with visual styles.

value.span: 如果用户已在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`、和方法都会引发。If this property is `false`, the and methods will throw an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定是否使用和方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to use the and methods. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]
